name: ColorSliderProps
description: A color slider allows users to adjust an individual channel of a color value.

isDisabled.description: Whether the whole Slider is disabled.

form.description:
The `<form>` element to associate the input with.
The value of this attribute must be the id of a `<form>` in the same document.
See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Reference/Elements/input#form).

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the current element.

aria-labelledby.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that labels the current element.

aria-describedby.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that describes the object.

aria-details.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that provide a detailed, extended description for the object.

onChange.description: Handler that is called when the value changes, as the user drags.

name.description: The name of the input element, used when submitting an HTML form. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#htmlattrdefname).

onChangeEnd.description: Handler that is called when the user stops dragging.

colorSpace.description:
The color space that the slider operates in. The `channel` must be in this color space.
If not provided, this defaults to the color space of the `color` or `defaultColor` value.

channel.description: The color channel that the slider manipulates.

children.description: The children of the component. A function may be provided to alter the children based on component state.

className.description: The CSS [className](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/className) for the element. A function may be provided to compute the class based on component state.

style.description: The inline [style](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement/style) for the element. A function may be provided to compute the style based on component state.

slot.description:
A slot name for the component. Slots allow the component to receive props from a parent component.
An explicit `null` value indicates that the local props completely override all props received from a parent.

orientation.description: The orientation of the color slider.

isDisabled.description: Whether the color slider is disabled.

minValue.name: minValue
minValue.description: The minimum value of the color channel.

maxValue.name: maxValue
maxValue.description: The maximum value of the color channel.

step.name: step
step.description: The step value of the color channel, used when incrementing and decrementing.

pageSize.name: pageSize
pageSize.description: The page step value of the color channel, used when incrementing and decrementing.

toFormat.name: toFormat
toFormat.description: Converts the color to the given color format, and returns a new Color object.

toString.name: toString
toString.description: Converts the color to a string in the given format.

clone.name: clone
clone.description: Returns a duplicate of the color value.

toHexInt.name: toHexInt
toHexInt.description: Converts the color to hex, and returns an integer representation.

getChannelValue.name: getChannelValue
getChannelValue.description:
Returns the numeric value for a given channel.
Throws an error if the channel is unsupported in the current color format.

withChannelValue.name: withChannelValue
withChannelValue.description:
Sets the numeric value for a given channel, and returns a new Color object.
Throws an error if the channel is unsupported in the current color format.

getChannelRange.name: getChannelRange
getChannelRange.description: Returns the minimum, maximum, and step values for a given channel.

getChannelName.name: getChannelName
getChannelName.description:
Returns a localized color channel name for a given channel and locale,
for use in visual or accessibility labels.

getChannelFormatOptions.name: getChannelFormatOptions
getChannelFormatOptions.description: Returns the number formatting options for the given channel.

formatChannelValue.name: formatChannelValue
formatChannelValue.description: Formats the numeric value for a given channel for display according to the provided locale.

getColorSpace.name: getColorSpace
getColorSpace.description: Returns the color space, 'rgb', 'hsb' or 'hsl', for the current color.

getColorSpaceAxes.name: getColorSpaceAxes
getColorSpaceAxes.description: Returns the color space axes, xChannel, yChannel, zChannel.

getColorChannels.name: getColorChannels
getColorChannels.description: Returns an array of the color channels within the current color space space.

getColorName.name: getColorName
getColorName.description: Returns a localized name for the color, for use in visual or accessibility labels.

getHueName.name: getHueName
getHueName.description: Returns a localized name for the hue, for use in visual or accessibility labels.

value.name: value
value.description: The current color value represented by the color slider.

setValue.name: setValue
setValue.description: Sets the current color value. If a string is passed, it will be parsed to a Color.

getDisplayColor.name: getDisplayColor
getDisplayColor.description: Returns the color that should be displayed in the slider instead of `value` or the optional parameter.

isDragging.name: isDragging
isDragging.description: Whether the color slider is currently being dragged.

values.name: values
values.description: Values managed by the slider by thumb index.

defaultValues.name: defaultValues
defaultValues.description: The default values for each thumb.

getThumbValue.name: getThumbValue
getThumbValue.description: Get the value for the specified thumb.

setThumbValue.name: setThumbValue
setThumbValue.description:
Sets the value for the specified thumb.
The actual value set will be clamped and rounded according to min/max/step.

setThumbPercent.name: setThumbPercent
setThumbPercent.description: Sets value for the specified thumb by percent offset (between 0 and 1).

isThumbDragging.name: isThumbDragging
isThumbDragging.description: Whether the specific thumb is being dragged.

setThumbDragging.name: setThumbDragging
setThumbDragging.description: Set is dragging on the specified thumb.

setFocusedThumb.name: setFocusedThumb
setFocusedThumb.description:
Set focused true on specified thumb. This will remove focus from
any thumb that had it before.

getThumbPercent.name: getThumbPercent
getThumbPercent.description: Returns the specified thumb's value as a percentage from 0 to 1.

getValuePercent.name: getValuePercent
getValuePercent.description: Returns the value as a percent between the min and max of the slider.

getThumbValueLabel.name: getThumbValueLabel
getThumbValueLabel.description: Returns the string label for the specified thumb's value, per props.formatOptions.

getFormattedValue.name: getFormattedValue
getFormattedValue.description: Returns the string label for the value, per props.formatOptions.

getThumbMinValue.name: getThumbMinValue
getThumbMinValue.description: Returns the min allowed value for the specified thumb.

getThumbMaxValue.name: getThumbMaxValue
getThumbMaxValue.description: Returns the max allowed value for the specified thumb.

getPercentValue.name: getPercentValue
getPercentValue.description: Converts a percent along track (between 0 and 1) to the corresponding value.

isThumbEditable.name: isThumbEditable
isThumbEditable.description: Returns if the specified thumb is editable.

setThumbEditable.name: setThumbEditable
setThumbEditable.description: Set the specified thumb's editable state.

incrementThumb.name: incrementThumb
incrementThumb.description: Increments the value of the thumb by the step or page amount.

decrementThumb.name: decrementThumb
decrementThumb.description: Decrements the value of the thumb by the step or page amount.

step.name: step
step.description: The step amount for the slider.

pageSize.name: pageSize
pageSize.description: The page size for the slider, used to do a bigger step.

orientation.name: orientation
orientation.description: The orientation of the color slider.

isDisabled.name: isDisabled
isDisabled.description: Whether the color slider is disabled.
